urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text: We've issued a #flood warning for the River Taw (Middle) from Taw Bridge to Newnham Bridge #Devon. Check your flood risk at https://t.co/HQ49ZHO9Ut https://t.co/5W8g4J4uYp

We've issued a flood warning for the River Teign (Lower) from Chudleigh to Kingsteignton #Devon, with river levels peaking at Exeter Road in the next few hours. #PrepareActSurvive and know your #flood risk https://t.co/K0E7OUFIx6 https://t.co/NDQeILDgwA

If you‚Äôre planning a big end of year clear out, be careful who you hire to dispose of your waste. Waste criminals pose as genuine waste collectors, take people's money but dump the waste illegally, putting our environment at risk.  

Share this video to let others know. https://t.co/NybBUaD4X8

tweets.text:
#StormBella is creating heavy winds and rain across parts of England, increasing the risk of #flooding to some areas. 
 
Avoid coastal paths and stay safe from strong winds and high waves. 
 
Check your flood risk now:
https://t.co/BpUpnjiX4L https://t.co/Kt3YXr5DV3

tweets.text: #Flood warnings are now in force for the Sherston Avon at Malmesbury #Wiltshire. Flooding is expected for Westport Bridge, The Maltings, St Johns Bridge, St Johns Street, Inner Silk Mills and The Mulberries. https://t.co/I5SE6gDKFL https://t.co/yUSbsh43Im

tweets.text: We've issued a #flood warning for Tetbury Avon at Malmesbury #Wiltshire. River levels are rising at the Brokenborough river gauge. Areas most at risk are Goose Bridge and St John's Street. Find out more at https://t.co/Ph8RuOfsKA https://t.co/NvHGwxDxzU

tweets.text:
Our teams are out across the area this evening in preparation for #stormbella. 

In St Neots, we have worked with @huntsdc to install flood gates and boards to increase #flood protection.

For the latest flood warnings and alerts visit ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/MztuI4Ooz5

#beprepared https://t.co/9qewxnzXZT

With #StormBella creating heavy winds and rain, we‚Äôve been working around the clock to reduce the risk of #flooding and keep communities safe. 

Remain vigilant, check your #flood risk now: https://t.co/BpUpnjiX4L https://t.co/6WnFpkY9ff

Good news that the severe flood warning has been lifted by @EnvAgency but please remain  vigilant and avoid floodwaters. Thanks once again to all our partners and volunteers for pulling together and assisting those affected. Proud of the people of Bedfordshire https://t.co/vzSxKaLCaq
@evolutionAgro @angling_dreams @WUFoundation @EnvAgency @NatResWales Number one reason .... dysfunctional soils

A #flood warning is now in force for the River Brue and Glastonbury Millstream from Lovington to Highbridge, including Tootle Bridge, Catsham, Church Moor at Baltonsborough, Street Drove, the B3151, Westhay Bridge and Tadham Moor.  https://t.co/NJmfQLcM2m https://t.co/47Py7u6M0s

entity.name: Relive the best of Glastonbury festival
entity.description: With Glastonbury Festival being cancelled this year, fans are coming together to celebrate the 50th festival from home. Check out iconic performances from the past via @bbcglasto on @bbciplayer & @bbcsounds. And sample the full experience & areas of the festival that make it so special via @glastonbury.

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyYNE I love how you think this will make a difference to whether Mytholmroyd floods or not, when it will make none what so ever. Great token gesture and photo opportunity though, I guess!

8.40am, #Christmas Sunday:

#Flooding expected in 1‚É£8‚É£ locations across the South East... and possible in 4‚É£9‚É£ more...

Please check YOUR flood-risk at https://t.co/i2cGx7L0qq, or on Floodline: 0345 988 1188.

Lots of advice on preparing for/dealing with flooding... #floodaware https://t.co/rnIjcR12S4

tweets.text:

Please check your #flood risk now ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/MztuI4Ooz5 https://t.co/1cySscy1p6

Stay safe, don't wave watch and stay back from quaysides, the water‚Äôs edge and beaches. https://t.co/9Z6IyCJCZq

tweets.text:
These images taken by a drone of #RattlesdenRiver, near #Stowmarket, show the extent of some of the flooding across the East today.

River levels are high ‚Äì please remain vigilant and check your flood risk to stay safe. https://t.co/9XAMDO9FsS https://t.co/wArLELFnJd

BEACH NOTICE: Due to surface water run-off caused by heavy rain, we've been advised by @EnvAgency this could affect water quality at beaches in the District. It is therefore advisable to avoid swimming in the sea for now. 
Heavy rainfall can increase the risk of cliff slips. https://t.co/0IYutok6CY

tweets.text:
Around 370,000 sewer blockages are recorded nationwide every year, resulting in more than 5,000 properties being flooded each year

You can help reduce this - scrape leftover cooking oils into the food waste or bin & not down the sink

Don‚Äôt feed a festive fatberg this Christmas. https://t.co/gXh0DWESpJ
